Learning_AssessorObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_AssessorObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_AssessorObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies assessors using unique references for updates. Leave blank when adding assessors.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Assessor_Data.description: References the worker of the assessor.
Indicates whether the assessor is inactive.

description: Contains detailed information about an assessor.

validation.validation: The assessor can't be a terminated worker.
validation.description: The assessor can't be a terminated worker.

validation.validation: You can't add an assessor if the worker is already an assessor.
validation.description: You can't add an assessor if the worker is already an assessor.

validation.validation: Enter a valid user. This user is not valid.
validation.description: Enter a valid user. This user is not valid.
